name: Tenyi Spirit - Surya
text: If you control a Wyrm monster or a face-up non-Effect Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material for a Wyrm monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Tenyi" Link Monster from your Extra Deck (but it cannot be used as Link Material), then you lose LP equal to its Link Rating x 1000. You can only use each effect of "Tenyi Spirit - Surya" once per turn.
